short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to monitor, river levels in the Wellington region

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
See an overview of flow and stage gauges related to Wellington's local kayaking rivers.

These currently include several gauges in the Wellington

Hutt River at Te Marua
Hutt River at Kaitoke
Akatarawa River at Cemetery
Otaki River at Pukehinau
Waiohine River at Gorge
Waingawa River at Kaituna
Waingawa River at Kaituna

The information provided within this extension should only be used as a guide. Check the date and time of the reading, which may not be up to date.
        
Where stated that a gauge is reading above a minimum flow, does not imply that the river is at a safe level to paddle. Please check out local conditions when arriving at the put in.

Do not paddle a river alone, and only paddle a river within your capabilities. The information contained within this mobile application was collected by the Greater Wellington Regional Council and has not been verified. Gauges can at times be out of calibration.
